pages.title: Fusion Engine Of Aetheric Innovation
pages.text: At the heart of the Magitek Research Facility lies the Fusion Engine Of Aetheric Innovation—a colossal, dynamic apparatus designed to synthesize raw magical energy with advanced technological components. Forged from void-forged alloy and transparent, enchanted crystal, its core hosts an ever-rotating vortex of raw aether that mesmerizes and fuels cutting-edge magitek experiments.

pages.title: Functions
pages.text: The Fusion Engine converts unstable magical energy into a refined, stable form, powering advanced artifacts, animating constructs, and reinforcing the Bastion’s defenses. With interlocking gears and arcane circuitry, it adapts in real time to various experimental configurations, seamlessly merging ancient magic with futuristic technology.
